  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_108664</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_108664</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The bell jar experiment in sound propagation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Glasglockeexperiment in der stichhaltigen 
Ausbreitung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'expérience de cloche en verre dans la 
propagation saine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A experiência do frasco de sino na propagação 
sadia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'esperimento di campana di vetro nella 
propagazione sana</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το πείραμα βάζων κουδουνιών στην υγιή διάδοση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El experimento de la campana de cristal en la 
propagación sana</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the bell jar setup for determining the role of air in sound propagation. sound coming from the bell will not be heard if air is pumped out of the jar.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">air</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bell jar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sound propagation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vibrations</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung stellt dar, daß die 
Glasglockeinstallation für die Bestimmung der Rolle der Luft im 
stichhaltigen Kommen der stichhaltigen Ausbreitung von der Glocke 
nicht gehört wird, wenn Luft aus dem Glas heraus gepumpt wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre que l'installation de 
cloche en verre pour déterminer le rôle d'air dans venir sain de 
propagation saine de la cloche ne sera pas entendue si de l'air est 
pompé hors de la fiole.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que a instalação do 
frasco de sino para determinar o papel do ar na vinda sadia da 
propagação sadia do sino não estará ouvida se o ar for bombeado 
fora do frasco.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra che la messa a punto 
di campana di vetro per la determinazione del ruolo di aria nel venire
sano di propagazione sana dalla flangia non sarà sentita se l'aria è
pompata dal vaso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει ότι η οργάνωση βάζων 
κουδουνιών για τον καθορισμό του ρόλου του αέρα στην υγιή υγιή 
προέλευση διάδοσης από το κουδούνι δεν θα ακουστεί εάν ο αέρας 
αντλείται από το βάζο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que la disposición de 
la campana de cristal para determinar el papel del aire en venir sano 
de la propagación sana de la alarma no será oída si el aire se 
bombea del tarro.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Luft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Glasglocke</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">stichhaltige Ausbreitung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erschütterungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">air</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">cloche en verre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">propagation saine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vibrations</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">frasco de sino</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">υγιής διάδοση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">δονήσεις</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
